text: Can you record my health data?
Sure, what is your user ID?
What is the date and time of your health data?
It was on July 10th, 2023 at 9:15 AM.
What kind of health data would you like to record?
My blood pressure was 140/90 and my heart rate was 85 bpm.
Your health data has been recorded.
Can you help me register for an appointment at the hospital?
What is the name of the doctor you want to see?
I want to see Dr. Johnson.
What date would you like to make the appointment for?
Can I make the appointment for August 15th, 2023?
Your appointment has been registered. Your appointment ID is 54752427.
I have a fever, can you tell me what it might be?

output.name: Influenza
output.aid: Treatment may involve antiviral medications, over-the-counter medications to manage symptoms, and rest and fluids to help the body recover.

output.name: Malaria
output.aid: Treatment may involve medications to kill the parasites and manage symptoms, as well as preventive measures such as mosquito nets and insect repellent.

text: According to the results, you may have Influenza or Malaria. Treatment may involve antiviral medications, over-the-counter medications to manage symptoms, and rest and fluids to help the body recover for Influenza or medications to kill the parasites and manage symptoms, as well as preventive measures such as mosquito nets and insect repellent for Malaria.
